name: Beware The Square (Nana)
description:
Beware the Square

Beware the Square is a project developed for the JamToday Andalucia 2018 at Granada (Spain), that won the first price at the game contest. Developed with the former team Blue Acentor, the main topic was "Fake News", so this game tells the story about a purple square that needs to fight against the fake news that say that those of his kind bring bad luck.

In the game you will have to deliver flyers to create awareness in the population and keep an eye on those that will try to sabotage you.
